obata ayawa hamuwuye kelesaka dayi kiyannata mama nodannemi.namuth ithihasaye yam dinaka kumak ho hethuwakata obata ayawa muna gasi atha.natha..eya kisisethma ahambayak wimata nam nohaka.ayawa hamuwima hudu ahambayak yayi yameku pawasuye nam eya tharam musawak thawath nathiwanu atha.oba ayawa hamuwannata aththe kisiyam hethuwakataya.awashyayenma obata ayagen laba gannata yamak thibenna atha.aya hamuwu pasu oba obe sithagi aya ha pawasannatada atha.

sulu jathika paksha matha pawathi rajaye sthawaraya randa pawathi bawin islam anthawadaya gana ewaka aarakshaka mandalayedi sakachcha sima wu bawa nithiya ha samaya pilibanda amathyanshaye hitapu lekamwarayekuwa siti padmasiri jayamanna mahatha pawasanawa.pasku janadhipathi komisame sakshi labademin ohu sandahan kale, jathika aaraksha kiwunsilaye raswim pawa ihala thalaye mattamaka nopawathi bawayi.pasku praharaya sambandhayen wimarshanaya kerena janadhipathi komisama hamuwe sakshi labadimata hitapu nithiya ha samaya amathyansha lekamwarayaku wu padmasiri jayamanna mahatha eeye paminiye dewana dinatayi.ehidi rajaye jyeshta adhinithignyawaraya jathika aarakshaka kawunsalaye raswim sambandhayen prashna karamin wimasuwe ema raswimwaladi saharan hashim sambandhayen sakachcha wuyeda yannayi.
